clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For induction of remission and consolidation in patients with acute promyelocytic leukemia APL and whose APL is characterized by the presence of the t 15 17 translocation or PML RAR alpha gene expression

contraindications.disease: Symptoms of overdose include convulsions muscle weakness and confusion
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Arsenic Trioxide is indicated for induction of remission and consolidation in patients with acute promyelocytic leukemia APL who are refractory to or have relapsed from retinoid and anthracycline chemotherapy
